verbs: Indeed... unfortunately
Chevron seven locked! ...finally
Incoming wormhole! ...it's never good news
Unscheduled offworld activation! ...again
Jaffa, Kree! ...they're not listening
SG-1, you have a go... good luck, you'll need it
Dial the gate! ...assuming it works this time
Closing the iris... should've done that sooner
For crying out loud! ...what now?
That's O'Neill with two L's... not that anyone cares
In the middle of my backswing?! ...typical
Undomesticated equines could not remove me... but deadlines might
Things will not calm down. They never do
Power alone does not make one a god... just tired
The Pentagon's lost entire countries... and my patience
Of course I dare mock you... what else is there
Kneel before your god! ...he's not listening either
You dare defy your god? ...everyone does, apparently
Shol'va! ...add it to the list
I'm a genius, not a magician! ...neither helps right now
Don't touch anything! ...too late
It's a city, not a yo-yo! ...could've fooled me
When it is appropriate... which is never
Engaging hyperdrive... pray it doesn't explode
Establishing wormhole... this is going to hurt
